name: Cozy Kitty
description:
The PAWsitive Kitty Cast Present...
Cozy Kitten!

Cozy used to be a tiny kitten..
But he started growing up relatively quickly 
He always had his favorite sweater on
but these days… it seems to not be in such great condition
As each day passes by, his sweater seems to be unstitching itself
..Until one day Cozy’s sweater broke into a pile of loose yarn…
Grab all the pieces of yarn to knit a new sweater!

Rules
use WASD to move
press SPACE to skip the time lapse at the start
Collect all the balls of yarn to win!
